column5: Does anybody know what is going on in the Pearson airport area today?  I have a flight at 4:00pm.  I am planning to leave earlier than normal.  I am not sure how much earlier than normal that I should leave.
Check the Toronto Sun. I know the gardener and other highways are closed... That being said, I don't think the 427 north is closed
Thanks, it actually wasn't much worse than normal.  401 was slow but 409 was fine.  I am in Vancouver now waiting for my to Seattle.
